title: The Eight Most Important NBA Players Heading Into the FIBA World Cup | Group Chat
description:
As the beginning of the FIBA World Cup approaches, we run down the most important NBA players competing in the tournament and speculate over what impact their participation might have on their 2019-20 NBA seasons.

Hosts: Justin Verrier and Jonathan Tjarks

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
